cards.name: Protomatter Powder
cards.text: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Protomatter Powder: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "There is no such thing as scrap metal. All such material can be repaired with the proper bonding agent." —Quennus, metallurgeon

rulings.text: The only difference between a colored artifact and a colorless artifact is, obviously, its color. Unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact requires colored mana to cast. Also unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact has a color in all zones. It will interact with cards that care about color. Other than that, a colored artifact behaves just like any other artifact. It will interact as normal with any card that cares about artifacts, such as Shatter or Arcbound Ravager.

You can’t sacrifice Protomatter Powder to return itself to the battlefield. First you choose the target (at which time it’s still on the battlefield), then you pay the costs (at which time you sacrifice it).

foreignNames.name: Urmaterie-Pulver
foreignNames.text: {4}{W}, {T}, opfere das Urmaterie-Pulver: Bringe eine Artefaktkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: „Metallschrott gibt es eigentlich nicht. Mit dem richtigen Bindemittel kann alles wieder repariert werden." —Quennus, Metalldoktor

foreignNames.name: Polvo de protomateria
foreignNames.text: {4}{W}, {T}, sacrificar el Polvo de protomateria: Regresa la carta de artefacto objetivo de tu cementerio al juego.
foreignNames.flavor: "No existe el metal inservible. Todos esos materiales pueden ser reparados con el componente adecuado." —Quennus, metalúrgico

foreignNames.name: Poudre de protomatière
foreignNames.text: {4}{W}, {T}, sacrifiez la Poudre de protomatière : Renvoyez en jeu la carte d'artefact ciblée de votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: « Rien n'est jamais bon pour la ferraille. Tout peut être réparé à condition d'avoir l'agent liant adéquat. » —Quennus, métallurgien

foreignNames.name: Polvere di Protomateria
foreignNames.text: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifica la Polvere di Protomateria: Rimetti in gioco una carta artefatto bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non esistono i rottami di metallo. Un tale materiale può essere riparato con il legante appropriato." —Quennus, metallurgo

foreignNames.name: 原始物の粉
foreignNames.text: {4}{W}, {T}, 原始物の粉を生け贄に捧げる：あなたの墓地にあるアーティファクト・カード１枚を対象とし、それを場に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「屑鉄なんてものは存在せんよ。 どんなものだって、きちんとした修復材があれば直せるんだ。」 ――機械医師のクェナス

foreignNames.name: Pó da Protomatéria
foreignNames.text: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifique Pó da Protomatéria: Devolva o card de artefato alvo de seu cemitério para o jogo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Nenhum metal precisa virar sucata. Todos esses materiais podem ser reparados com a solda apropriada." — Quennus, metalurgião

foreignNames.name: Порошок Протовещества
foreignNames.text: {4}{W}, {T}, пожертвуйте Порошок Протовещества: верните целевую карту артефакта из вашего кладбища в игру.
foreignNames.flavor: «Нет такого понятия, как металлолом. Даже самый негодный материал можно починить с помощью правильного крепителя». — Квеннус, врачеватель металла

foreignNames.name: 原质粉
foreignNames.text: {4}{W}，{T}，牺牲原质粉：将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「没有所谓的废铁。 只要有所需的结合触媒，这些东西全都可以修好。」 ～金属医师昆奈斯

cards.originalText: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Protomatter Powder: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to play.

cards.name: Battlefront Krushok
cards.text:
Battlefront Krushok can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can't be blocked by more than one creature.
cards.flavor: Krushoks clear debris from fertile fields, fallow fields, and battlefields.

rulings.text: The second ability applies only as blockers are declared. If a creature you control with no +1/+1 counters on it becomes blocked by more than one creature, putting a +1/+1 counter on it won’t change or undo the block.

foreignNames.name: Frontlinien-Krushok
foreignNames.text:
Der Frontlinien-Krushok kann nicht von mehr als einer Kreatur geblockt werden.
Jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst und auf der eine +1/+1-Marke liegt, kann nicht von mehr als einer Kreatur geblockt werden.
foreignNames.flavor: Krushoks räumen jegliche Art von Feldern frei: fruchtbare Felder, brachliegende Felder und sogar Schlachtfelder.

foreignNames.name: Krushok del frente de batalla
foreignNames.text:
El Krushok del frente de batalla no puede ser bloqueado por más de una criatura.
Cada criatura que controlas con un contador +1/+1 sobre ella no puede ser bloqueada por más de una criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Los krushok limpian de desechos los campos fértiles, los campos en barbecho y los campos de batalla.

foreignNames.name: Krushok de première ligne
foreignNames.text:
Le Krushok de première ligne ne peut pas être bloqué par plus d'une créature.
Chaque créature que vous contrôlez avec un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle ne peut pas être bloquée par plus d'une créature.
foreignNames.flavor: Les krushoks évacuent les débris des champs fertiles, des champs en jachère et des champs de bataille.

foreignNames.name: Krushok sul Fronte di Battaglia
foreignNames.text:
Il Krushok sul Fronte di Battaglia non può essere bloccato da più di una creatura.
Ogni creatura che controlli con un segnalino +1/+1 non può essere bloccata da più di una creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: I krushok rimuovono i detriti dai campi coltivati, dai campi incolti e dai campi di battaglia.

foreignNames.name: 戦線クルショク
foreignNames.text:
戦線クルショクは、２体以上のクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。
あなたがコントロールする＋１/＋１カウンターが置かれている各クリーチャーは、２体以上のクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。
foreignNames.flavor: クルショクは肥沃な農地、休閑地、そして戦場から残骸を片付けてくれる。

foreignNames.name: 최전방 크루쇽
foreignNames.text:
최전방 크루쇽은 둘 이상의 생물에게 방어당할 수 없다.
당신이 조종하는 생물 중 +1/+1 카운터를 가진 각 생물은 둘 이상의 생물에게 방어당할 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: 크루쇽은 비옥한 땅, 휴경지, 전장 등 장소를 가리지 않고 잔해를 먹어치운다.

foreignNames.name: Krushok da Frente de Batalha
foreignNames.text:
Krushok da Frente de Batalha não pode ser bloqueado por mais de uma criatura.
Cada criatura que você controla com um marcador +1/+1 não pode ser bloqueada por mais de uma criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Os krushoks removem os entulhos de campos férteis, campos vazios e campos de batalha.

foreignNames.name: Авангардный Крушок
foreignNames.text:
Авангардный Крушок не может быть заблокирован более чем одним существом.
Каждое существо под вашим контролем, на котором есть жетон +1/+1, не может быть заблокировано более чем одним существом.
foreignNames.flavor: Крушоки убирают мусор с плодородных полей, полей под паром и полей битвы.

foreignNames.name: 前线寇犀
foreignNames.text:
前线寇犀不能被一个以上的生物阻挡。
每个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均不能被一个以上的生物阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 寇犀不仅能扫荡沃地，扫荡闲地，还能扫荡阵地。

foreignNames.name: 前線寇犀
foreignNames.text:
前線寇犀不能被一個以上的生物阻擋。
每個由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均不能被一個以上的生物阻擋。
foreignNames.flavor: 寇犀不僅能掃蕩沃地，掃蕩閒地，還能掃蕩陣地。

cards.originalText:
Battlefront Krushok can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can't be blocked by more than one creature.

cards.name: Feral Krushok
cards.flavor: In a stunning act of diplomacy, Yasova Dragonclaw ceded a portion of Temur lands to the Sultai. Her clan protested until they saw she had given the Sultai the breeding grounds of the krushoks. They hadn't realized she had a sense of humor.

foreignNames.name: Wildes Krushok
foreignNames.flavor: In einem verblüffenden Akt der Diplomatie trat Yasova Drachenklaue einen Teil der Temur-Lande an die Sultai ab. Ihr Klan protestierte lautstark, bis sie bemerkten, dass sie den Sultai das Brutgebiet der Krushok überlassen hatte. Bis dahin war ihnen gar nicht bewusst gewesen, dass ihr Khan Sinn für Humor hatte.

foreignNames.name: Krushok salvaje
foreignNames.flavor: En un acto diplomático sorprendente, Yasova Garradragón cedió una porción de territorio temur a los Sultai. Su clan protestó... hasta que vieron que les había regalado la zona de crianza de los krushok. No sabían que tuviese sentido del humor.

foreignNames.name: Krushok sauvage
foreignNames.flavor: Dans un incroyable élan de diplomatie, Yasova Griffedragon céda une partie des terres temuriennes aux Sultaï. Les membres de son clan protestèrent avant de s'apercevoir qu'il s'agissait de la zone de reproduction des krushoks. Ils ne savaient pas qu'elle avait le sens de l'humour.

foreignNames.name: Krushok Selvatico
foreignNames.flavor: Con un incredibile gesto diplomatico, Yasova Artiglio di Drago cedette una parte delle terre Temur ai Sultai. I membri del suo clan protestarono, finché non si accorsero che si trattava del terreno di riproduzione dei krushok. Nessuno si aspettava che Yasova avesse senso dell'umorismo.

foreignNames.name: 残忍なクルショク
foreignNames.flavor: 驚くべき外交的英断として、龍爪のヤソヴァはティムールの領土の一部をスゥルタイに割譲した。氏族の者たちは抗議したが、後に彼女が割譲したのは実はクルショクの繁殖地であったことを知ることとなった。彼女にユーモアのセンスがあったことを、同じ氏族の者たちは知らなかったのである。

foreignNames.name: 야생 크루쇽
foreignNames.flavor: 야소바 용발톱은 놀라운 외교술을 펼쳐 테무르 영토 일부를 술타이 부족에게 이양했다. 테무르 부족민들은 이 결정에 맹렬하게 반대했지만, 이양된 땅이 크루쇽의 번식지라는 사실을 알자 야소바를 비난하는 것을 멈췄다. 그들은 야소바가 유머감각을 가지고 있다는 것을 몰랐었다.

foreignNames.name: Krushok Bestial
foreignNames.flavor: Em um ato impressionante de diplomacia, Yasova Garra de Dragão cedeu parte das terras Temur para os Sultai. Seu clã protestou, até perceber que o território cedido aos Sultai era o local de reprodução dos krushoks. Eles não sabiam que ela tinha senso de humor.

foreignNames.name: Свирепый Крушок
foreignNames.flavor: Ясва Коготь Дракона сделала гениальный дипломатический ход, передав султайцам часть земель Темура. Возмущению ее клана не было предела, пока не стало ясно, что эти земли облюбовали для своих брачных игр крушоки. Собратья Ясвы и не подозревали, что у нее есть чувство юмора.

foreignNames.name: 野性寇犀
foreignNames.flavor: 龙爪娅绍娃先前将部分铁木尔领土割让给苏勒台以示好的决定激起了轩然大波。族人强烈反对，不过他们发现可汗让出的是寇犀的繁殖地后，才算了解到她的用心良苦。

foreignNames.name: 野性寇犀
foreignNames.flavor: 龍爪婭紹娃先前將部分鐵木爾領土割讓給蘇勒台以示好的決定激起了軒然大波。族人強烈反對，不過他們發現可汗讓出的是寇犀的繁殖地後，才算了解到她的用心良苦。

cards.name: Great-Horn Krushok
cards.flavor: Perfectly suited for life in the Shifting Wastes, the krushok is well protected by its horn, its hide, and its temper.

foreignNames.name: Riesenhorn-Krushok
foreignNames.flavor: Krushoks sind mit ihren Hörnern, ihrem Panzer und ihrem Temperament perfekt an das Leben in den Wandelnden Wüsten angepasst.

foreignNames.name: Krushok grancuerno
foreignNames.flavor: El krushok está perfectamente adaptado a vivir en los Yermos Cambiantes. Le protegen su cuerno, su pellejo y su mal genio.

foreignNames.name: Krushok à grande corne
foreignNames.flavor: Parfaitement adapté à la vie des Landes changeantes, le krushok est protégé par sa corne, sa cuirasse et son tempérament.

foreignNames.name: Krushok Grancorno
foreignNames.flavor: Perfettamente adattato alla vita nelle Distese Cangianti, il krushok è ben protetto dal suo corno, dalla sua pelle spessa e dal suo temperamento.

foreignNames.name: 大角クルショク
foreignNames.flavor: 変容する荒野の生活に完璧に適応したクルショクは、その角と皮と気質によって固く守られている。

foreignNames.name: 큰뿔 크루쇽
foreignNames.flavor: 변화하는 황무지에 완벽하게 적응한 크루쇽들은 뿔과 가죽, 거친 성질로 잘 무장되어 있다.

foreignNames.name: Krushok de Chifre Longo
foreignNames.flavor: Perfeitamente compatíveis com a vida nos Ermos Mutáveis, os krushok são bem protegidos por seu chifre, sua couraça e seu temperamento.

foreignNames.name: Большерогий Крушок
foreignNames.flavor: Крушок отлично приспособлен к жизни в Бродячих Пустошах. Его защищают рог, шкура и скверный характер.

foreignNames.name: 巨角寇犀
foreignNames.flavor: 寇犀的锐利尖角、糙厚外皮和暴躁脾气正是抵御变幻荒漠的最佳防护，极其适应此险恶环境。

foreignNames.name: 巨角寇犀
foreignNames.flavor: 寇犀的銳利尖角、糙厚外皮和暴躁脾氣正是抵禦變幻荒漠的最佳防護，極其適應此險惡環境。

cards.name: Hypervolt Grasp
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
{1}{U}: Return Hypervolt Grasp to its owner's hand.

foreignNames.name: Hochspannungsgriff
foreignNames.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung
Die verzauberte Kreatur hat „{T}: Diese Kreatur fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu".
{1}{U}: Bringe den Hochspannungsgriff auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Anschalten. Losschießen.

foreignNames.name: Abrazo hipervóltico
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura.
La criatura encantada tiene "{T}: Esta criatura hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo."
{1}{U}: Regresa el Abrazo hipervóltico a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Encendido. Apagado.

foreignNames.name: Emprise d'hypervolt
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : créature
La créature enchantée a « {T} : Cette créature inflige 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur. »
{1}{U} : Renvoyez l'Emprise d'hypervolt dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Alternatif ou continu ?

foreignNames.name: Stretta Ipervoltaica
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura
La creatura incantata ha "{T}: Questa creatura infligge 1 danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio".
{1}{U}: Il proprietario riprende in mano la Stretta Ipervoltaica.
foreignNames.flavor: Sfreccia qui. Sfreccia là.

foreignNames.name: 超電撃の掌握
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは「{T}：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。このクリーチャーはそれに１点のダメージを与える。」の能力を持つ。
{1}{U}：超電撃の掌握をオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: バシッと来て、 ズバッと退く。

foreignNames.name: Toque de Hipervolts
foreignNames.text:
Encantar Criatura
A criatura encantada tem "{T}: Esta criatura causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura alvo ou ao jogador alvo."
{1}{U}: Devolve Toque de Hipervolts para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Zapt. Zupt.

foreignNames.name: Шокирующий захват
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо
Зачарованное существо приобретает свойство "{T}: Это существо наносит 1 повреждение целевому существу или игроку".
{1}{U}: Верните Шокирующий захват в руку владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: Подать разряд. Отключить разряд.

foreignNames.name: 高压电攫
foreignNames.text:
生物结界
受此结界的生物具有「{T}：此生物对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。」
{1}{U}：将高压电攫移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 通电。 断电。

cards.name: Staggershock
cards.text:
Staggershock deals 2 damage to any target.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: If a spell with rebound that you cast from your hand doesn’t resolve for any reason (due being countered by a spell like Cancel, or because all of its targets are illegal), rebound has no effect. The spell is simply put into your graveyard. You won’t get to cast it again next turn.

If you cast a spell with rebound from anywhere other than your hand (such as from your graveyard due to Sins of the Past, from your library due to cascade, or from your opponent’s hand due to Sen Triplets), rebound won’t have any effect. If you do cast it from your hand, rebound will work regardless of whether you paid its mana cost (for example, if you cast it from your hand due to Maelstrom Archangel).

If a replacement effect would cause a spell with rebound that you cast from your hand to be put somewhere else instead of your graveyard (such as Leyline of the Void might), you choose whether to apply the rebound effect or the other effect as the spell resolves.
Rebound will have no effect on copies of spells because you don’t cast them from your hand.

If you cast a spell with rebound from your hand and it resolves, it isn’t put into your graveyard. Rather, it’s exiled directly from the stack. Effects that care about cards being put into your graveyard won’t do anything.

At the beginning of your upkeep, all delayed triggered abilities created by rebound effects trigger. You may handle them in any order. If you want to cast a card this way, you do so as part of the resolution of its delayed triggered ability. Timing restrictions based on the card’s type (if it’s a sorcery) are ignored. Other restrictions are not (such as the one from Rule of Law).

If you are unable to cast a card from exile this way, or you choose not to, nothing happens when the delayed triggered ability resolves. The card remains exiled for the rest of the game, and you won’t get another chance to cast the card. The same is true if the ability is countered (due to Stifle, perhaps).
If you cast a card from exile this way, it will go to your graveyard when it resolves, fails to resolve, or is countered. It won’t go back to exile.

foreignNames.name: Taumelschock
foreignNames.text:
Der Taumelschock fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
Abprall (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch aus deiner Hand wirkst, schicke ihn ins Exil, sowie er verrechnet wird. Du kannst zu Beginn deines nächsten Versorgungssegments diese Karte aus dem Exil wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.)

foreignNames.name: Choque tambaleador
foreignNames.text:
El Choque tambaleador hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.
Rebote. (Si lanzas este hechizo de tu mano, exílialo en cuanto se resuelve. Al comienzo de tu próximo mantenimiento, puedes lanzar esta carta desde el exilio sin pagar su coste de maná.)

foreignNames.name: Ébranlechoc
foreignNames.text:
L'Ébranlechoc inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.
Rebond (Si vous lancez ce sort depuis votre main, exilez-le au moment où il se résout. Au début de votre prochain entretien, vous pouvez lancer cette carte depuis l'exil sans payer son coût de mana.)

foreignNames.name: Colpo Barcollante
foreignNames.text:
Il Colpo Barcollante infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
Ripresa (Se lanci questa magia dalla tua mano, esiliala quando si risolve. All'inizio del tuo prossimo mantenimento, puoi lanciare questa carta dall'esilio senza pagare il suo costo di mana.)

foreignNames.name: よろめきショック
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。よろめきショックはそれに２点のダメージを与える。
反復 （あなたがこの呪文をあなたの手札から唱えた場合、それの解決に際し、それを追放する。 あなたの次のアップキープの開始時に、あなたはこのカードを追放領域からマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。）

foreignNames.name: Tonto-choque
foreignNames.text:
Tonto-choque causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.
Rebote (Se conjurar esta mágica da sua mão, exile-a quando ela for resolvida. No início de sua próxima manutenção, você poderá conjurar este card do exílio sem pagar seu custo de mana.)

foreignNames.name: ヴァルショクの心臓焚き
foreignNames.text: ヴァルショクの心臓焚きが戦場に出たとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで＋２/＋０の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: 鍛冶屋が戦槌を作り出すのと同じ程の情熱で、彼は奮起の言葉を作り出す。

foreignNames.name: Animofoguista Vulshoque
foreignNames.text: Quando Animofoguista Vulshoque entra no campo de batalha, a criatura alvo recebe +2/+0 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Ele cria palavras comoventes com tanto entusiasmo quanto um ferreiro cria um martelo de guerra.

foreignNames.name: Вулшокский Разжигатель Сердец
foreignNames.text: Когда Вулшокский Разжигатель Сердец выходит на поле битвы, целевое существо получает +2/+0 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Он придает форму разящим словам так же страстно, как кузнец придает форму боевому молоту.

foreignNames.name: 瓦许克心炉师
foreignNames.text: 当瓦许克心炉师进战场时，目标生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 他以激情创作激励人心的话语，正如铁匠创作战锤。

foreignNames.name: 瓦許克心爐師
foreignNames.text: 當瓦許克心爐師進戰場時，目標生物得+2/+0直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 他以激情創作激勵人心的話語，正如鐵匠創作戰鎚。

cards.originalText: When Vulshok Heartstoker enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Vulshok Replica
cards.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Vulshok Replica: It deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: All the fury of the Vulshok with only a trace of their recklessness.

foreignNames.name: Vulshok-Ebenbild
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}, opfere das Vulshok-Ebenbild: Das Vulshok-Ebenbild fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Die ganze Wut der Vulshok, doch nur eine Spur ihres Leichtsinns.

foreignNames.name: Réplica de vúlshok
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}, sacrificar la Réplica de vúlshok: La Réplica de vúlshok hace 3 puntos de daño al jugador objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Toda la furia de los vúlshok pero sólo un poco de su imprudencia.

foreignNames.name: Reproduction vulshoke
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}, sacrifiez la Reproduction vulshoke : La Reproduction vulshoke inflige 3 blessures à un joueur ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: Toute la fureur des Vulshoks mais juste une trace de leur témérité.

foreignNames.name: Replicante Vulshok
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifica il Replicante Vulshok: Il Replicante Vulshok infligge 3 danni a un giocatore bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Tutta la rabbia dei Vulshok con solo una traccia della loro imprudenza.

foreignNames.name: ヴァルショクの模造品
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}, ヴァルショクの模造品を生け贄に捧げる：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。ヴァルショクの模造品はそのプレイヤーに３点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 無謀さの痕跡だけを備えたヴァルショクの怒りのすべて。

foreignNames.name: Réplica de Vulshoque
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifique Réplica de Vulshoque: Réplica de Vulshoque causa 3 pontos de dano ao jogador alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Toda a fúria dos vulshoques com apenas um mínimo de sua imprudência.

foreignNames.name: Вулшок-Репликант
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}, пожертвуйте Вулшока-Репликанта: Вулшок-Репликант наносит 3 повреждения целевому игроку.
foreignNames.flavor: Вся ярость вулшоков и лишь намек на их бесшабашность.

foreignNames.name: 瓦许克摹制品
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}，牺牲瓦许克摹制品：瓦许克摹制品对目标牌手造成3点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 具有瓦许克人的怒火，但几乎不含其急躁。

foreignNames.name: 瓦許克摹製品
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}，犧牲瓦許克摹製品：瓦許克摹製品對目標玩家造成3點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 具有瓦許克人的怒火，但幾乎不含其急躁。

cards.originalText: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Vulshok Replica: Vulshok Replica deals 3 damage to target player.

cards.name: Sudden Shock
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Sudden Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: Arc mages aren't known for their patience.

rulings.text: Players still get priority while a card with split second is on the stack.
Split second doesn’t prevent players from activating mana abilities.
Split second doesn’t prevent triggered abilities from triggering. If one does, its controller puts it on the stack and chooses targets for it, if any. Those abilities will resolve as normal.
Split second doesn’t prevent players from performing special actions. Notably, players may turn face-down creatures face up while a spell with split second is on the stack.
Casting a spell with split second won’t affect spells and abilities that are already on the stack.
If the resolution of a triggered ability involves casting a spell, that spell can’t be cast if a spell with split second is on the stack.

foreignNames.name: Plötzlicher Schock
foreignNames.text:
Sekundenbruchteil (Solange dieser Zauberspruch sich auf dem Stapel befindet, können Spieler keine Zaubersprüche oder aktivierte Fähigkeiten spielen, die keine Manafähigkeiten sind.)
Plötzlicher Schock fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Lichtbogenmagier sind nicht gerade für ihre Geduld berüchtigt.

foreignNames.name: Choque súbito
foreignNames.text:
Fracción de segundo (Mientras este hechizo esté en la pila, los jugadores no pueden jugar hechizos o habilidades activadas que no sean habilidades de maná.)
El Choque súbito hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Los magos de arcos no son conocidos por su paciencia.

foreignNames.name: Choc soudain
foreignNames.text:
Fraction de seconde (Tant que ce sort est sur la pile, les joueurs ne peuvent pas jouer de sorts ou de capacités activées qui ne sont pas des capacités de mana.)
Le Choc soudain inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: Les mages à l'arc de feu ne sont pas connus pour leur patience.

foreignNames.name: Shock Improvviso
foreignNames.text:
Battibaleno (Fintanto che questa magia è in pila, i giocatori non possono giocare magie o abilità attivate che non siano abilità di mana.)
Lo Shock Improvviso infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli arcimaghi non sono rinomati per la loro pazienza.

foreignNames.name: 突然のショック
foreignNames.text:
刹那 （この呪文がスタックにあるかぎり、プレイヤーは呪文やマナ能力でない起動型能力をプレイできない。）
クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。突然のショックはそれに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 弧炎の魔道士ほど、辛抱が似合わない者達はいない。

foreignNames.name: Choque Repentino
foreignNames.text:
Fração de segundo (Enquanto esta mágica estiver na pilha, os jogadores não poderão jogar mágicas ou habilidades ativadas que não sejam habilidades de mana.)
Choque Repentino causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura alvo ou ao jogador alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Os magos do Arco não são conhecidos por sua paciência.

foreignNames.name: Внезапный Шок
foreignNames.text:
Мгновение ока (До тех пор пока это заклинание находится в стеке, игроки не могут играть заклинания или активируемые способности, которые не являются мана-способностями.)
Внезапный Шок наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.
foreignNames.flavor: Верховные маги не знали устали.

foreignNames.name: 瞬息电震
foreignNames.text:
转瞬（只要此咒语在堆叠上，牌手便不能使用咒语或不是法术力异能的起动式异能。）
瞬息电震对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 电弧法师当然不以耐心闻名。

cards.originalText:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't play spells or activated abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Sudden Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
